name: Anita
wishText: May the Good Lord always be with you and protect you for me! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many more blessings, happiness na mapensi
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now finya apo chini uskie kakitu and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
